title: How to Open a Flickr Account

steps.headline: Go to the homepage by clicking here.
steps.description: On the right hand side of the screen, click on "Create Your Account" button.

steps.headline: Sign in with your Yahoo ID and password.
steps.description: If you don't have one, you'll need to create a Yahoo account. After doing so, click on "Sign Up" or "Sign In".

steps.headline: Decide whether you want to have a free or pro account.
steps.description: Here is a comparison list between the two accounts.
